# onName

**Type Property**

Coalesce notifications with the same name.

## Declaration

```swift
static var onName: NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing { get }
```

## Constants

- **none**: Do not coalesce notifications in the queue.
- **onSender**: Coalesce notifications with the same object.

items.description: Do not coalesce notifications in the queue.
items.name: none

items.description: Coalesce notifications with the same object.
